description:
Thumbor is a smart imaging service, which enables on-demand crop,
resizing and flipping of images. With built-in state-of-the-art face and
feature detection algorithms, it delivers a very smart content-aware
image cropping and resizing.

In this talk, I will deliver an short introduction to thumbor and
discuss how HK01 leverages thumbor to build its next generation image
processing pipeline, serving thumbnails and responsive images to its 9M+
audience.
title: Thumbor: a smart image processing pipeline
